Class Game

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains logic needed for connecting various parts of the engine together.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigFolder

        public static java.io.File getConfigFolder()
        Returns the folder where configuration files are stored. Plugins as well as the core system packages store config files here.
        Returns:
        the configuration folder

      • getPackageManager

        public static PackageManager getPackageManager()
        Returns the game's package manager.
        Returns:
        The package manager

      • getPluginFolder

        public static java.io.File getPluginFolder()
        Returns the folder where plugins are stored. Packages in this folder are loaded by the server.
        Returns:
        the folder where plugins are stored

      • getDataFolder

        public static java.io.File getDataFolder()
        Returns the folder where plugin data is stored. Packages in this folder are used by plugins.
        Returns:
        the folder where plugins are stored

      • getRootDir

        public static java.io.File getRootDir()
        Returns the root directory for this program. This is usually located where the system stores application data.
        Returns:
        the home/root directory for the program

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes main subsystems.

      • setupDirectories

        public static void setupDirectories()
        Sets up the directories for storing files for the server. This includes plugins, logs, and saved data.
